title: Shoe Horn, 1604
inscribed: "Robert Mindum made this shooing...(worn at top) s Gamlet Anno domini 1604
provenance: Purchased by the donor's husband in the early 1960's at an English antiques shop.
description: Typical curved tapered cylindrical shape, upcurved at both ends, with engraved and stained decoration featuring a fleur de lys over a band of guilloche above a stylized flower-foliage cluster and arched pattern all surrounded by the inscription "Robert Mindum made this shooing...(worn at top) s Gamlet Anno domini 1604".

tombstone.epitaph:
Shoe Horn, 1604.
1604. Horn. Gift of Barbara Munves. 2011-31-1.
